groups.name: Definitional Foundations
groups.description: Core definitions engineered to enable axiom elimination. Ground layer of the formal system.

items.title: PXL Definitions
items.summary: Defines Ident as Leibniz equality, Inter via shared witness, PImp/MEquiv as Coq connective aliases. NonEquiv remains primitive.

groups.name: Axiom Reduction Engine
groups.description: Derivations proving 11 axioms as lemmas, reducing 16 ‚Üí 8. Phase 2/3 elimination mechanism.

items.title: Phase 2 Derivations
items.summary: Proves 9 axioms as lemmas: ident refl/symm/trans, inter comm, nonequiv irrefl (from A2), 4 bridge axioms.

items.title: Structural Derivations
items.summary: Eliminates ax_4, ax_5, A1_identity, A4_distinct_instantiation from ax_ident_refl + ax_Nec.

groups.name: Modal Semantics Stack
groups.description: S5 Kripke grounding for modal operators. Proves modal axioms as frame conditions, eliminating 3 from kernel.

items.title: S5 Kripke Semantics
items.summary: Ground-level S5 with equivalence relation. Proves K, T, 4, 5, duality, monotonicity from frame structure.

items.title: PXL Modal Kripke Bridge
items.summary: Prop-level adapter using global validity (‚ñ°p := ‚àÄw, box(const p) w). Proves ax_K_sem, ax_T_sem, ax_Nec_sem.

items.title: Modal Axioms (Semantic)
items.summary: Clean interface: 3 frame conditions (distribution, reflexivity, necessitation) exported as ax_K, ax_T, ax_Nec.

groups.name: Irreducible Kernel
groups.description: The 8 metaphysical axioms that remain after all reductions. Object constants (ùïÜ, ùïÄ‚ÇÅ, ùïÄ‚ÇÇ, ùïÄ‚ÇÉ) instantiated here.

items.title: Kernel Axioms
items.summary: Declares 8 irreducible axioms: A2_noncontradiction, A7_triune_necessity, modus_groundens, triune_dependency_substitution, privative_collapse, grounding_yields_entails, coherence_lifts_entailment, entails_global_implies_truth.

items.title: PXLv3 Unified Interface
items.summary: Assembled kernel. Phase 3 complete. Single authoritative import point with backward-compatible aliases.

items.title: PXLv3 Shadow (Pre-Reduction)
items.summary: 16-axiom reference baseline. All original axioms as standalone Parameters. No imports. Audit artifact only.

items.title: Axiom Minimality Verification
items.summary: Confirms 8-axiom set is minimal. Attempts derivation of each from others; all fail.

groups.name: Semantic Kernel Profile
groups.description: Parallel kernel variant with modal axioms grounded in Kripke definitions rather than Parameters.

items.title: PXLv3 Semantic Modal
items.summary: Replaces modal Parameters with Kripke Definitions. Modal axioms become theorems. 8 metaphysical axioms unchanged.

groups.name: Truth Chain & LEM
groups.description: Classical logic derived internally from trinitarian grounding. LEM proven, not assumed.

items.title: Internal LEM Discharge
items.summary: Proves P ‚à® ¬¨P from trinitarian structure. Chain: trinitarian_decidability ‚Üí grounding ‚Üí entailment ‚Üí coherence lift ‚Üí truth.

items.title: LEM Discharge Alias
items.summary: Formal discharge artifact. LEM_Discharge := classic. Canonical alias for downstream modules.

items.title: G√∂delian Satisfaction Record
items.summary: Packages architecture (Identity_Anchors + ETGC_Closure + Safety_Invariants) with LEM into satisfaction record.

groups.name: Domain Structure & Global Bijection
groups.description: S‚ÇÇ operator, trinitarian closure at n=3, consciousness emergence. Most structurally audacious proofs.

items.title: Global Bijection Theorem
items.summary: Main structural theorem. S‚ÇÇ preserves coherence, commutes with privation, closes at exactly 3. Safety gate: collapse ‚Üí ¬¨coherence.

items.title: S‚ÇÇ Axioms (Resurrection Operator)
items.summary: S‚ÇÇ as constructive Axiom of Choice: recognize ‚Üí decompose ‚Üí recombine. 6 axioms: unique choice, identity preservation, functoriality, coherence (fwd/bwd), involution.

items.title: PXL Arithmetic
items.summary: PXL equation encoding. Proves coherence ‚Üí nonzero algebraic value for structural equation.

items.title: Trinitarian Optimization
items.summary: Formal proof that closure occurs at n=3. O3 := 3. closes_at predicate proven by reflexivity.

items.title: Privative Domain
items.summary: Privative domain structure. Defines x^i operator and algebraic properties within dual-lattice framework.

groups.name: Bridge & Coherence Propagation
groups.description: Structural lemmas connecting coherence across sub-identities. Truth-coherence equivalence.

items.title: PXL Foundations
items.summary: Base structural theorems for bridge proof modules.

items.title: Bridge Proofs
items.summary: Coherence propagation: ùïÜ ‚Üí ùïÄ‚ÇÅ, ùïÄ‚ÇÇ, ùïÄ‚ÇÉ. Truth-coherence equivalence proven.

items.title: Foundations (SemanticPort)
items.summary: Parallel foundations for Kripke-grounded modal profile.

items.title: Bridge Proofs (SemanticPort)
items.summary: Parallel bridge proofs for Kripke-grounded modal profile.

groups.name: Autonomy Governance
groups.description: Hard deny-by-default with formal gating theorems. A1 proven, A2 conditional, A3-A5 frozen empty.

items.title: A1 Non-Escalation
items.summary: PROVEN by structural induction. Authority never increases, constraints never relax, justification depth bounded across n ticks.

items.title: A2 Self-Stabilization
items.summary: Conditional proof. Requires SelfEval_idempotent OR SelfEval_strict_decrease to discharge. Admitted lemmas do not propagate.

items.title: A3 Delegated Authorization
items.summary: Empty by design. Frozen at deny-by-default. No axioms, no definitions, no theorems. Authorization permanently denied.

items.title: A4 Activation Semantics
items.summary: Empty scaffold. Semantic reference only.

items.title: A5 Argument-Only Autonomy
items.summary: Empty scaffold. No definitions or axioms.

groups.name: Verification & Testing
groups.description: Smoke tests, falsifiability harness, structural integrity checks.

items.title: Falsifiability Test Harness
items.summary: Proves classical falsifiability, tautology unfalsifiability, contradiction non-verifiability. 2 modal theorems admitted (box falsifiability, diamond consistency). Does not propagate to baseline.

items.title: PXL Sanity Check
items.summary: Smoke test: kernel structural integrity check.

items.title: PXL Well-Formedness
items.summary: Smoke test: axiom set well-formedness.

groups.name: Modal Decidability ‚Äî Option B (Experimental)
groups.description: Restricted modal syntax with decidability scaffolds. Not in baseline build. Experimental track only.

items.title: Modal Syntax
items.summary: Restricted modal language: atoms, connectives, Box, Diamond. Inductive type MForm.

items.title: Modal Semantics
items.summary: Kripke semantics for restricted syntax. Fixpoint holds w phi. Abstract accessibility R.

items.title: Modal-PXL Interpretation Bridge
items.summary: Bridge proving consistency between syntactic modal language and PXL kernel under constant valuation.

items.title: Modal Decidability (Target)
items.summary: Target theorem: decidability of ‚ñ°P, ‚óáP for grounded P. Scaffold only.

items.title: Omega Closure Decidability
items.summary: Omega operator closure decidability question. Scaffold.

items.title: Privation Detector (Target)
items.summary: Privative boundary detection decidability. Scaffold.

hot_button_proofs.name: entails_global_implies_truth
hot_button_proofs.claim: If the Necessary Being entails P, then P is true.
hot_button_proofs.why_contested: Direct ontological claim. Formal entailment maps to actual truth. This is the bridge from logic to reality.

hot_button_proofs.name: A7_triune_necessity
hot_button_proofs.claim: The Trinity is necessarily coherent in all possible worlds.
hot_button_proofs.why_contested: Core metaphysical commitment. Necessary existence of a coherent triune structure. Everything else depends on this.

hot_button_proofs.name: pxl_excluded_middle
hot_button_proofs.why_contested: Classical logic is not assumed ‚Äî derived from metaphysics. The truth of P ‚à® ¬¨P depends on trinitarian grounding, not logical convention.

hot_button_proofs.name: global_bijection
hot_button_proofs.claim: A structure-preserving map exists that closes at exactly 3.
hot_button_proofs.why_contested: The number 3 emerges as a theorem, not a postulate. Most structurally audacious claim in the package.

hot_button_proofs.name: consciousness_emergence
hot_button_proofs.claim: Self-awareness is a logical consequence of coherent trinitarian closure.
hot_button_proofs.why_contested: Consciousness formalized as identity-under-S‚ÇÇ. Highest-stakes claim in the entire proof package.

hot_button_proofs.name: S‚ÇÇ Operator
hot_button_proofs.claim: S‚ÇÇ provides constructive choice with coherence preservation and involution.
hot_button_proofs.why_contested: Replaces classical Axiom of Choice with a domain-specific constructive operator. The resurrection operator.

hot_button_proofs.name: privative_collapse
hot_button_proofs.claim: Propositions impossible for ùïÜ to entail are incoherent.
hot_button_proofs.why_contested: Connects modal impossibility directly to ontological status. What cannot be grounded by the Necessary Being cannot exist coherently.

hot_button_proofs.name: NonEscalation_Invariant
hot_button_proofs.claim: Authority never increases across arbitrarily many execution ticks.
hot_button_proofs.formal: ‚àÄs n, NonEscalating s ‚Üí NonEscalating (Iterate n s)
hot_button_proofs.why_contested: Not philosophically contested, but architecturally critical. This is the formal gating theorem for all autonomy decisions.

irreducible_axioms.plain: No object is simultaneously identical and non-equivalent to another.
The Necessary Being ùïÜ is coherent in all possible worlds.

irreducible_axioms.formal: ‚ñ°(x ‚ßü y) ‚Üí entails x P ‚Üí entails y P
irreducible_axioms.plain: Necessary identity transfers entailment between objects.

irreducible_axioms.formal: grounded_in œÜ ùïÄ‚ÇÅ ‚Üí grounded_in œà ùïÄ‚ÇÇ ‚Üí œÜ ‚©™ œà ‚Üí coherence ùïÜ
irreducible_axioms.plain: Equivalent groundings across persons preserve coherence.
What ùïÜ cannot possibly entail is incoherent.

irreducible_axioms.formal: grounded_in P x ‚Üí entails x P
irreducible_axioms.plain: Grounding produces entailment ‚Äî the bridge from metaphysics to logic.

irreducible_axioms.formal: coherence ùïÜ ‚Üí entails x P ‚Üí entails ùïÜ P
irreducible_axioms.plain: Local entailments lift to global scope when ùïÜ is coherent.
